firstSection.title: About Deustocoin
firstSection.p1: DeustoCoin is a project that aims to promote the motto “Blockchain for Good” and contribute to a better world through the emerging technology that Blockchain is.
firstSection.p2: This project consists of a web application in which both members of the University of Deusto and campaign promoters belonging to companies outside the university (cafeterias, museums, transport...) can operate.
firstSection.p3: Through this project, it is intended to improve the corporate image of the University, complying with several of the 17 SDGs (Sustainable Development Goals) established by the United Nations.

secondSection.title: How it works

p1.beforeLinks: There are several roles that make up the DeustoCoin platform, in addition to a cryptocurrency compatible with
p1.afterLinks: (UDCoin), which will be the currency to be exchanged for the different offers. The roles in question vary depending on the user, and there are three: collaborators, promoters, and administrator, which will be able to carry out the tasks of the two previous types of users.

secondSection.p2: The collaborators will be able to carry out a series of tasks such as consulting campaigns, exchanging UDCoins for rewards and registering an action in order to obtain its respective reward.
secondSection.p3: Promotores will be able to launch campaigns, rewards and actions, monitor their KPIs, and observe in graphs the progress of the actions corresponding to the campaigns.
